sections.paragraph: உண்மையாக, நிச்சயமாக, மெய்யாக, உறுதியாக "ஆம்" எனப் பொருள்படும் - எச்சம்

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primary particle; properly indicative of affirmation or concession (in fact); usually followed by a contrasted clause with G1161 (this one, the former, etc.: - even, indeed, so, some, truly, verily. Often compounded with other particles in an intensive or asseverative sense.
